p: A total of 19 kinds of HBV markerâ€™s phenotype distribution were found. Of which, 43.8% were isolated HBsAb positive (effectively vaccinated against Hepatitis B), and 30.2% were negative for HBV markers (susceptible to Hepatitis B). Moreover, 1.6% were positive for HBsAg, HBeAg, and HBcAb (active Hepatitis B), while 2.9% were positive for HBsAg, HBeAb, and HbcAb (Chronic hepatitis B).
